title: Kristen Bell & Dax Shepard | Bombshell Emails Reveal Trump Planned Coup with Loyalist Jeffrey Clark: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at damning new evidence of Donald Trump’s plan to overthrow democracy.

Then, Kristen Bell and Dax Shepard talk about hosting their competition series Family Game Fight! and Bell’s new show Do, Re & Mi.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
